RelatedSentence: Sixteen fire firefighters from three Prince George Fire Rescue halls responded to the 1900 block of Spruce Street around 10 p.m. where crews found a couch fuelling the flames engulfing a second - storey balcony .

RelatedSentence: No one was injured in the fire , though firefighters had to assist a physically challenged occupant from the basement .
